channel.title: Photos on eD! Thomas
channel.description: Recent content in Photos on eD! Thomas

item.title: Good Boy at the Park
item.description: He’s not technically my dog, but he didn’t know that, and neither did I for approximately three glorious minutes.

item.title: Mountain Sunset
item.description: One of those moments where you just stop walking and stare for a while. The photo doesn’t do it justice, but then again, they never do.

item.title: A Breakfast Situation
item.description: Is it pretentious to photograph your breakfast? Probably. Did I do it anyway? Obviously.

item.title: City Lights
item.description: There’s something about a city at night that makes everything feel both enormous and intimate at the same time.
